name: Footsteps in the Mist Internal Darkness
name_original: Footsteps in the Mist Internal Darkness
description:
Izumi, 24, a woman with financial and emotional problems, meets Kard, both a personification of her Negative emotions from the start of her life. She will try to fight against her emotions, while on the other hand, Kard is a being that feeds on negative emotions, like a demon clinging onto reality. Who will succeed? We will see it in the main story.

This is a visual novel where you find a point way to a better life while trying to fight your thoughts.
